publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2542 Des McNulty: Clydebank Women’s Aid Jog Group Complete the Great Scottish Run—That the Parliament congratulates the group of women and workers from Clydebank Women’s Aid who completed either the Great Scottish Run 10K or the half marathon on Sunday 7 September 2008; recognises that most of the women involved have been experiencing domestic abuse, living in a refuge or have recently escaped domestic abuse, and believes that this is testimony to their courage and provides further evidence of the strength and resilience of women.
S3M-2542 Clydebank Women’s Aid Jog Group Complete the Great Scottish Run (lodged on 12 September 2008) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2542 Clydebank Women’s Aid Jog Group Complete the Great Scottish Run (lodged on 12 September 2008) Hugh O’Donnell*, Sandra White*, Marlyn Glen*, Elaine Smith*, Sarah Boyack*, Cathy Peattie*, James Kelly*, Stuart McMillan*, Jamie Stone*, Kenneth Gibson*, Patrick Harvie*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, Trish Godman*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-2542 Clydebank Women’s Aid Jog Group Complete the Great Scottish Run (lodged on 12 September 2008) Karen Whitefield*, Bob Doris*, Andy Kerr*
S3M-2542 Clydebank Women’s Aid Jog Group Complete the Great Scottish Run (lodged on 12 September 2008) Gil Paterson*, Helen Eadie*
